description: This table contains detailed information about each accounting voucher, including line items, amounts, and descriptions.
This table holds the master records for accounting vouchers, summarizing the overall voucher information such as voucher number, date, and total amount.
This table tracks the amortization schedules for loans, including payment dates, principal amounts, interest amounts, and remaining balances.
This table contains the master records for loans, including loan details such as loan number, borrower information, loan amount, interest rate, and term.
This table stores information about customers, including customer ID, name, contact details, and other relevant information.
